other_tests.findings: Trace positivity for amyloid by special stains.
Strikingly severe liver parenchymal involvement with large patches of amyloid separating hepatic cords, amorphous eosinophilic deposits in portal triads, and patchy deposits in hilar vessels.
Post-transplant course complicated by thrombotic occlusion of renal graft artery in Case 1; uneventful in Case 2.
